segments.text: Are you through with your meal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we are . Could we have the check please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you go . I can take care of it here when you are already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm sorry we don't . We accept credit cards and cash .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't have any cash with me , I'll have to put it on a credit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , I'll be right back . Do you need any to go boxes ? I'd be glad to bring you some when I come back .
segments.speaker: S1
